info.name: Flickr WideScreen (Viewer) - FlickrHiveMind v.3
info.description: ► It's for a WIDESCREEN(1920x1080)! ► It's for FlickrHiveMind. It's a cool and fast viewer for discover Flickr stream ... ► What the style do ?: - Compact the page - Minimize Tags Lists and Zebra Color for tags and users links - Hover on the 3 bottom list to see them etc ... ► ► This Userstyle is s a part of my "Flickr WideScreen Collection". The First one: ► Flickr WideScreen - ALLinONE WIDE ▶ Please Comment and give Feedback if you like this Style :-)
info.additionalInfo: ► I use the dark style provide by the site... ► my preferences set : - Photos: 500/pg - Size: 250 - Viewer : Flickr Photo Page ► last Changes: - Font-size - header size (more compact) - Corrections of position of some elements - Position Preferences Box - add Tags Hover red border ► ► This Userstyle is s a part of my "Flickr WideScreen Collection". The First one: ► Flickr WideScreen - ALLinONE WIDE Add a Dark/Grey Style?. Use my personal tweak (more Dark): ► Flickr WideScreen - DARK/Grey (Tweak Perso) The "Flickr WideScreen Collection" : ► Flickr Small Justified ( Paginator+Counter) ► FlickrWideScreen - Photo Page Less Wide ► Flickr WideScreen - Wide Film Strip Thumbs X2 - For Flickr Userscripts (GM: cf greasemonkey): ► Flickr WideScreen - SCRIPT - Commented ON-FLUID ► Flickr WideScreen - Script (GM) - Flickr Functional Suite(Update 2014) ► FLICKR NEW GLOBAL NAV BAR + SCRIPTS (GM) - For Flickr Viewers : ► Flickr WideScreen - FlickrHiveMind ► Flickr WideScreen - DACKR Viewer ►► NEW - AFTER NEW DESIGN 2014 : To get the old page back : Get Old Page Back Instructions: Flickr Photo Page : Get Old Page Back You can use the Firefox Addon too : Random Agent Spoofer And read: Photopage scripts broken (HTTPS?) ►► ====== USO MIRROR ??? ====== "userscripts.org" is down. "userscripts.org:8080" is down too. :-( But Now you can Use "userscripts-mirror.org" ;-) ► uso-mirror (greasy Fork) by trespassersW: Useful when searching for script via google, this userscript Redirects userscripts.org links to userscripts-mirror.org , the Static Mirror Of userscripts.org . Also redirects userscripts.org:8080 links (which stop to work now). ► Here are new Redirector (firefox addon)settings: - Include pattern: (.*?)s?\://(.*?)\buserscripts.org(\:8080)?\/(.*) - Redirect to: $1://$2userscripts-mirror.org/$4 ► To follow this userscripts.org story and found the last tweaks: userscripts.org is down, but... ►► Firefox Addons and Greasemonkey Scripts (GM) for Flickr. Read here which Flickr Greasemonkey Script (GM) you can use : "My BIG List Of Scripts", in "Flickr Hacks". ▷ Thumbnail Preview With: ▶ "Splash Album Viewer Fixed" - AutoPager support(Splash album viewer Fixed (USO Mirror)) It's the better solution for many Flickr thumbnail : FAST and Simple... ▶ Thumbnail Zoom Plus( Firefox Addon) Very Good addon to use on many sites too. ► Firefox Infinite Page Addon, in Use and Recommended: This Style Work well, like my others style, with: ► AUTOPAGER ► AUTOPAGERS Rules in use with the "FlickrWideScreen" collection - AutoPager's SET Rule : read the related topic ...
